Description: Heart amulet: in opaque black glass, glossy surface, pierced vertically. The body is decorated with thin opaque white threads horizontally. Over these wider brick-red threads have been trailed, also arranged horizontally.
Curator's comments: Probably from the same workshop as 1952,1213.30
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (fig.38, pp.36-37)
